name: VoiceRewardsMe
0:
”Alexa, launch Voice Rewards”
”Alexa, ask Voice Rewards for a Nike survey”
”Alexa, open Voice Rewards and give me the Nike survey”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice rewards
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Voice Rewards Me is the only way to share your thoughts and opinions via any Amazon Alexa-powered device or mobile app - and earn money while doing it!

Getting started is easy:

- Say, “Alexa, enable Voice Rewards”
- Link your account when prompted.
- Say “Alexa, launch Voice Rewards”
- Take your first survey

It’s that easy!

When you are ready to redeem or review your earnings, register at VoiceRewards.me using the same email you used to link your account to Voice Rewards during the skill install.

Don’t forget to add the Voice Rewards Me Flash Briefing to your daily briefing too so you never miss a new opportunity to earn.

Voice Rewards and VoiceRewards.me are provided by True Reply.

Surveys available via Voice Rewards may cover anything from travel to consumer product experiences, in-store retail experiences, political views, sports, and entertainment. Participation in any survey is always voluntary and survey participation is never required.

The survey information you provide via the Voice Rewards Me skill are archived and may potentially be used for research purposes, follow-up surveys, or additional offers. By installing the Voice Rewards Me skill, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy found on VoiceRewards.Me and that by clicking “accept” or installing, downloading, enabling, or using the Service, you are acknowledging your agreement to be bound by them.

Surveys available via Voice Rewards Me are distributed by foundations, organizations, and companies that value your opinion. Your responses to questions are shared with these same foundations, organizations, and companies that create the surveys you participate in. Additional details on how we monetize your responses while protecting your privacy may be found in our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy linked below and available at VoiceRewards.me.
